comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: Flag today? How about the next time it snows we have a snow angel contest...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Do I look fat in these tights? I mean all four pairs. The secret today was layering. I was warmth incarnate both up and down Flag, even if I did look like the Michelin Man. Took me ten minutes to peel all that stuff off when I got back. I'm good-to-go for the snow angel contest, Dennis... _Serious_ wingspan. DU
